name: Dream Lotus
description: Dream Lotus by Bodhi Seeds is a hybrid strain that was designed to recreate the widely cherished qualities of Blue Dream, but with an accentuated chunky bud structure. This rendition combines a Santa Cruz cut of Blue Dream with Bodhiâ€™s Snow Lotus, resulting in a strain that maintains uplifting effects and a fragrant blueberry aroma. Hashy spice and sweet herbal notes can be detected on the exhale in a flavor that ushers in blissful effects perfect for stress relief any time of the day.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Relaxed, Euphoric, Energetic, Stress, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Nausea, Dizzy, Headache, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Paranoid
